question: The relative abundance of dissolved salts in seawater in descending order is as follows
option1: chlorine, sodium, sulphate, magnesium, calcium, potassium
option2: sodium, chlorine, magnesium, potassium, sulphate, calcium
option3: chlorine, magnesium, calcium, sodium, potassium, sulphate
option4: chlorine, sodium, magnesium, calcium, potassium, sulphate
answer: chlorine, sodium, sulphate, magnesium, calcium, potassium
